name: Game No.5
description:
Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows - moving
  • Spacebar - jump
  • Alt - Summoning the red character. When the red character stops and raises his staff above his head, you can jump on him.
  • Hold Shift or Ctrl - open the menu
  • Release Shift or Ctrl - confirm your choice

Jump sound: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/jump-15984/

Collect sound: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/collectcoin-6075/

Use sound: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/item-equip-6904/
